review: This is the only CES device in its class. The hardware & build are 5 stars. It doesn't have all the channels of Roku, but how many channels do you need? Fire TV is in the top 2 of cable cutters. The downside is "smart" TVs are getting smarter & offer as much or more than this device. The advantage of having "smart" is the seamless transition from internet to live TV whether you have OTA or STB. In the mean time, I would recommend this device.
